page.title: 07Housing and Religon
page.content:
1owners but were no sold . After about 18 months they were purchased by the counciland let for pensioners. Theres more land left to build on and some more bungalows are needed.
{Religion
Before 1872 the district of Dudleston Heath and Criftins was served by{St. {Mary's Church,}Dudleston.Because of an increase in the population{St. {Matthew's Church}was built in 1874 to serve the Dudleston Heath and Criftins areas. The money for building the church came from a grant, but also by public Subscription. Mr. Green has been vicar here for 7 years, but has recently left.There is no full time vicar at the moment.Mr. Green.The longest serving vicar was
